resources.string: Tap the image to enlarge - Tap the name to see details
Portret image of Richard Matthew Stallman

Richard Matthew Stallman is the president of the Free Software Foundation (FSF), developer of the GNU operating system, developer of the GNU Compiler Collection (GCC), developer of Emacs (advanced text editor), and symbol for open source software.
Portret image of Linus Benedict Torvalds

Linus Benedict Torvalds is the developer of the Linux kernel ("just a hobby" he said) and the developer of the Git version control system.\nThe operating system i am currently using uses the kernel he made.
Portret image of Dennis MacAlistair Ritchie
Dennis MacAlistair Ritchie is the creator of the C programming language and the UNIX operating system, both are very important to the development of computers.\nHe passed away in 2011.
